jrigby.openstack_queue.server

Class QueueCommandProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrigby.openstack_queue.server.QueueCommandProcessor

  • public class QueueCommandProcessor
extends Object
    Processes any command received that alters the queue state e.g. by submitting jobs, deleting jobs or shutting down the queue.
    Author:
    jason

    • Method Detail

      • processCommand

        public void processCommand(String command,
                  QueueCommandProcessor.CommandType type)
        Processes a queue command
        Parameters:
        command - the command
        type - the command type

      • jobSubmitCommand

        private void jobSubmitCommand(String command)
        Job submit commands are purely json objects. In this implementation, json is interpreted as a ThreeStageJobResourceRequest, which expects a bootstrap, execute and cleanup script. The json message itself is processed by ThreeStageJobResourceRequestJsonMessage. Invalid queue requests are just ignored.
        Parameters:
        command - json message

      • adminCommand

        private void adminCommand(String command)
        Admin commands consist of a keyword followed by values that may be grouped with quotation marks if required. The only admin command that is not handled here is the "shutdown" command.
        Parameters:
        command -

      • splitCommand

        private String[] splitCommand(String command)
        Splits the text into space separated elements except where enclosed in quotation marks.
        Parameters:
        command - the command parameters to split
        Returns:
        a string array of commands
